value:
$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|All right, we should be getting to
nasty Nótt's Night Temple soon!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And when we reach the Night
Temple, we will be able to save
$Nu...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Well, we don't know for sure, right?
What kind of fool would make their
escape to such an obvious place?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|A-Alfonse—look! Over there!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Is that Prince Ótr? And is that
$Nu with him?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What is he doing here?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh, so you're here already, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ótr, stop there! Where are you going?
Return $Nu to us!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Nótt!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will make quick work of them.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Nótt?! What have you—$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How could you, Sis?!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|I leave it to you, Nótt.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I will make you proud. Now hurry
and go, my dear prince!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Of course! You sap. You've fallen
for yet another guy!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait—what? What's going on?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Nótt is a sucker for any man with a
half-decent face. She goes goo-goo
for them if they even glance her way!$k$pBut, Nótt...HIM?! He's prince
of Niðavellir!$k$p$EFace_Cool|My dear simpleton sister, he's so
obviously using you! End this!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, Dagr... Such jealousy is
unbecoming of a princess!$k$pI understand catching a prince is
beyond some prattling pest like
yourself, but...not for me!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Do not abandon hope, dear sister.
I've faith there's a man with stench
suitable to a buzzing pest like you!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right. That's IT! I'm going to
kill you once and for all!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Rrrr-RAAAHH!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Nyaaahh!$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE16_05,0|$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Nice! Looks like I win. Better luck
next time, Sis! *wink*$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This can't be happening... I lost?
To YOU of all people?! Y-you've
never beaten me before, and now...$k$pWhy now?!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|I may not be able to beat you under
normal circumstances, sure.$k$p$EFace_Smile|But with that man distracting you,
I could have beat you with my
eyes closed!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ugh... Forgive me, Prince Ótr!
I am unworthy of your love!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Snap out of it! He used you like
a sacrificial pawn to cover his
escape, didn't he?!$k$pHe doesn't care about you! He just
wanted to use you! He's scum and
a manipulator—and you're his mark!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Shut up! Damn you... I knew what
was happening here!$k$p$EFace_Pain|But I... I still loved him...
Oh, Ótr... *sob*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Errr... Hm.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What an embarrassment...$k$p$EFace|All right. Quit crying. No one's going
to fall for your cool-princess shtick
while you're all weepy. C'mon.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you aren't upset with me?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Well, trying to beat you to the punch,
I already picked a fight with Alfster
here myself.$k$pSo, I don't have much of a high horse
to lecture you from, but...you should
help the Askrans out.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|I understand. Thank you, Dagr. And...
I hope you can forgive me.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Oh, cut it out already. If you keep
sniveling like that, I'm going to lose
my mind.$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I'm happy the two of you were able
to make up! You're siblings after all.
It's for the best that you get along!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Blush2|Oh, that just...hit my heart a little!
I hope my brothers and I can come
to an understanding someday too...$k$p$EFace_Blush|Then the three of us can live happily
together again! It'll happen soon!
...Right? Won't it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Of course it will, Reginn.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes! I'm going to do my best to make
it happen as soon as I can!$k$pBut first things first... We have to go
save $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|I was thinking the same thing, but...
Do you have any idea where Prince
Ótr might have gone?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Not yet, but don't worry! I'll figure
something out!$k$pWe'll find a way to follow Ótr and
$Nu somehow!$k$p$Sbs150|
